attributes.action: Change the learning curriculum in schools
attributes.additional_details: Children and young adults need to know about real life situations instead of learning something that is so irrelevant to most.
attributes.background:
Stop learning things that will be irrelevant to most people and start learning things that will be relevant to everyone.

Instead of learning Algebra etc learn about vat, mortgages, interest rates etc

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642926
